title: Hey it's Soumik Das here!
tagLine: Welcome to my part of the internet!
opening0: I'm a Front-end Developer, based in
para0: I love to get beautiful and interactive uis get into life, with proficiency in front end frameworks and tools like: React/React Native, Next.js, Tailwind Css, Framer Motion and etc. I am very passionate about what i do and so have keen interest in learning new and trending technologies, be that a framework or a tool!
